name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Golang**, **Node.js**, and **Redis** development within high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in implementing **microservices** architectures and **ETL** processes, ensuring efficient data processing and performance tuning. Proficient in deploying and managing monitoring solutions using **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, and skilled in CI/CD practices with **GitHub Actions**.
Demonstrated leadership abilities in guiding teams and driving project success, while maintaining compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept in leveraging **ClickHouse** for optimized data handling and building AI/ML-powered platforms with **FastAPI** and **Django** for real-time analytics and automation. Strong technical background in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a solid foundation in cloud services, particularly **AWS** and **Azure**.
